Description: Fragment of arched sistrum: of crude workmanship, and only the beginning of the arch survives on each side; at the base of the arch is a seated cat. The double Hathor head has a curled wig. The two lateral uraei both have the white crown; the line of their bodies is continued to form a semicircular mount for the Hathor head. The handle is in the form of a column with papyrus capital, with three tie-bands at the top, and ending in a knob. The sistrum has been made in one piece.
